00034 class BDSOctStepper : public G4MagIntegratorStepper
00035 {
00036 
00037   public:  // with description
00038 
00039     BDSOctStepper(G4Mag_EqRhs *EqRhs);
00040

00043       void Stepper( const G4double y[],
00044                   const G4double dydx[],
00045                   const G4double h,
00046                   G4double yout[],
00047                   G4double yerr[]  );
00048       // The stepper for the Runge Kutta integration.
00049       // The stepsize is fixed, equal to h.
00050       // Integrates ODE starting values y[0 to 6]
00051       // Outputs yout[] and its estimated error yerr[].
00052 
00053     G4double DistChord()   const;
00054       // Estimate maximum distance of curved solution and chord ... 
00055  
00056      void SetBTrpPrime(G4double aBTrpPrime);
00057      G4double GetBTrpPrime();
00058 
00059      void StepperName();
00060 
00061   /*
00062    void DumbStepper( const G4double yInput[],
00063                      G4ThreeVector Bfld,
00064                      G4double hstep,
00065                      G4double yOut[]);
00066 
00067   */
00068   public: // without description
00069   
00070     G4int IntegratorOrder()const { return 2; }
00071 
00072   protected:
00073     //  --- Methods used to implement all the derived classes -----
00074 
00075     void AdvanceHelix( const G4double  yIn[],
00076                        G4ThreeVector Bfld,
00077                        G4double  h,
00078                        G4double  yOct[]);    // output 
00079       // A first order Step along a oct inside the field.
00080 
00081   private:
00082   
00083     G4ThreeVector yInitial, yMidPoint, yFinal;
00084       // Data stored in order to find the chord.
00085 
00086     G4Mag_EqRhs*  fPtrMagEqOfMot;
00087 
00088     G4double itsBTrpPrime;
00089   //    G4ThreeVector itsInitialPoint, itsFinalPoint, itsMidPoint,itsDistVec;
00090     G4double itsDist;
00091 
00092 };

00094 inline  void BDSOctStepper::SetBTrpPrime(G4double aBTrpPrime)
00095 {itsBTrpPrime=aBTrpPrime;
00096 }
00097 inline G4double BDSOctStepper::GetBTrpPrime()
00098 {return itsBTrpPrime;}

00101 {G4cout<<"BDSOctStepper"<<G4endl;}
